name: altkit
description: A toolkit with useful commands for everyday text manipulation.

commands.title: ALTKit: Show All Commands
ALTKit: Capitalizes each word in the selection
ALTKit: Cleans text by removing non-printable characters and extra whitespace
ALTKit: Computes the MD5 hash of the selection
ALTKit: Computes the SHA1 hash of the selection
ALTKit: Computes the SHA256 hash of the selection
ALTKit: Converts a selected date string to a Unix timestamp
ALTKit: Converts a selected Unix timestamp to a UTC date string
ALTKit: Converts HTML entities to characters
ALTKit: Converts HTML to Markdown
ALTKit: Converts Markdown to HTML
ALTKit: Converts selection to a URL-friendly slug
ALTKit: Converts selection to camelCase
ALTKit: Converts the selected HEX color to RGB(A) format
ALTKit: Converts the selected HSL(A) color to RGB(A) format
ALTKit: Converts the selected RGB(A) color to HEX format
ALTKit: Converts the selected RGB(A) color to HSL(A) format
ALTKit: Converts the selection to lowercase
ALTKit: Converts the selection to uppercase
ALTKit: Counts line occurrences and displays a summary table
ALTKit: Decodes the Base64 selection
ALTKit: Decrypts selection with AES-256-CBC
ALTKit: Encodes the selection to Base64
ALTKit: Encrypts selection with AES-256-CBC
ALTKit: Enquotes the selection in double quotes
ALTKit: Enquotes the selection in single quotes
ALTKit: Evaluates the selected JavaScript code
ALTKit: Filter Lines (Keep matches, Regex)
ALTKit: Filter Lines (Keep matches)
ALTKit: Filter Out Lines (Remove matches, Regex)
ALTKit: Filter Out Lines (Remove matches)
ALTKit: Formats the selected JSON nicely
ALTKit: Increments numbers or letters based on the first selection
ALTKit: Insert current ISO date/time
ALTKit: Insert current Unix milli timestamp
ALTKit: Insert current Unix timestamp
ALTKit: Joins selected lines with a comma and space
ALTKit: JSON Stringify the selected texts
ALTKit: Minifies the selected JSON
ALTKit: Pad lines to the left
ALTKit: Pad lines to the right
ALTKit: Query selected JSON using a JSONPath expression
ALTKit: Removes duplicate lines from the selection or document
ALTKit: Removes HTML tags from selection, preserving line breaks and preformatted blocks
ALTKit: Removes Markdown formatting from the selection
ALTKit: Replaces selection with a new UUID
ALTKit: Replaces selection with a random 15-character string
ALTKit: Replaces selection with a random 30-character string
ALTKit: Reverses selected lines, words, or characters
ALTKit: Shows/hides selection stats in the status bar
ALTKit: Shuffles selected lines, words, or letters
ALTKit: Sorts the selected lines alphabetically
ALTKit: Sorts the selected lines in reverse alphabetical order
ALTKit: Toggles color format (HEX -> RGB -> HSL -> HEX)
ALTKit: URL Decode
ALTKit: URL Encode
